metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30890 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in macOS Monterey 12.0.1, iOS 15.1 and iPadOS 15.1, watchOS 8.1, tvOS15.1. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universalcross site scripting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.34.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.34.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.34.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.34.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.34.3-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.34.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.34.3-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
